title: Chocolate Almond Macaroons
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°. Line baking sheets with parchment paper. Sift together powdered sugar, almond flour, and cocoa powder. Beat egg whites with salt until stiff peaks form. Gently fold dry ingredients into egg whites. Pipe or spoon 1-inch rounds onto prepared baking sheets. Let stand 30 minutes to form skin. Bake 12-15 minutes. Cool completely on baking sheets before removing.
